title: Alphabet's Charts Are Still Strong as Investors Focus on the Future
text:
Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL) is the Stock of the Day at Real Money. We looked at the chart of GOOGL on Monday ahead of its earnings release after the close. We concluded that, "GOOGL looks set to make a bullish upside breakout. Traders who can afford to risk below $1,240 could go long or add to existing longs here. Strength above $1,308 is very bullish."

Sometimes stocks can change direction overnight so let's check out this patterns this morning.

In this updated Japanese candlestick chart of GOOGL, below, we can see a couple of developments that were not there Monday. Prices have dipped Tuesday but they are off their lows (hence we see a lower shadow). The pullback stopped at the top end of nearby support in the $1,260-$1,240 area.

In this updated Point and Figure chart of GOOGL, below, we get another view of the price action. Here support starts at $1,244.21 and the volume by price bars on the left side of the chart show good support.

Bottom-line strategy: Continue to hold longs in GOOGL and consider adding to your position on strength above $1,308.
description: Alphabet's Charts Are Still Strong as Investors Focus on the Future...GOOGL
authors: Alphabet'S Charts Are Still Strong As Investors Focus On The Future
Indicators After The Company'S Latest Earnings.
